item.description:
What a fantastic show. Can't wait for the movie
Will post the exact time later on in the week

Hope you can join us
Looking forward to meeting some of you

Many of you have paid me the initial fee put in order to keep this website going I am going to need the $19.95 from you at the event

Thanks
Kerry
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the tables by the snack bar

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group
